org.cmg.resp.protocol
Class MessageHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.cmg.resp.protocol.MessageHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
Node.NodeMessageHandler
public abstract class MessageHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This is the abstract class that, imlementing pattern Visitor, defines the behaviour of a generic message handler.

Author:
Michele Loreti
